title: Field of Nightmares
description: Everyone has experienced a nightmare at some point in their life. Whether it was triggered by a scary movie or ghost story told around a campfire, the relief upon waking up has always been realizing that, “It was only a dream!” Find out what happens when the horrifying events from a fourteen year old baseball stars dream comes true. Field of Nightmares combines great tension surrounding every day kids, with real-life settings and even the grand game of baseball woven into the story line. Bobby Drysdale is a phenom with a bright future ahead of him when his world begins to fall apart. He starts experiencing nightmares and whatever events happen in his dream, come true the next day and he is powerless to stop them. Adding to the mystery, he is being haunted by the ghost of a rich eccentric who built much of the town a half century ago. Bobby soon realizes that he is being forced to figure out what the connection is between the visits from the ghost and the horrific dreams. The threat of continuing nightmares, the anxiety felt by Bobby as his fear of sleeping grows and the mysterious story of Enos Cotter, all keep readers of Field of Nightmares guessing and turning pages deep into the night.
author: Grayson Tumult
